content.query:
-- ALTER VIEW gso.dim_survey_question
-- AS

SELECT
     [QUESTION_ID] 
    ,CAST(LEFT(QUESTION_CREATED_DATE,19) AS DATETIME) as [QUESTION_CREATED_DATE]
    ,[QUESTION_NAME] 
    ,CAST(LEFT([QUESTION_LAST_MODIFIED_TS] ,19) AS DATETIME) as [QUESTION_LAST_MODIFIED_TS]
    ,[QUESTION_TEXT]  
    ,[QUESTION_ORDER] 
    ,[QUESTION_TYPE]
    ,[TIPO_QUESTAO] 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://gsksynapseaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/gskoutputfiles/GSO/dimensao_survey_question.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET') 
        WITH( [QUESTION_ID] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,QUESTION_CREATED_DATE VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[QUESTION_NAME] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[QUESTION_LAST_MODIFIED_TS] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[QUESTION_TEXT]  VARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[QUESTION_ORDER] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[QUESTION_TYPE] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[TIPO_QUESTAO] VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 ) as ROW
